parameters.parameter4: Script Log Location [ /var/log/com.company.log ] (i.e., Your organization's default location for client-side logs)
parameters.parameter5: The custom trigger used to call the App Auto-Patch Jamf Policy [ex: AppAutoPatch ]
parameters.parameter6: The number of days until the activator resets the patching status to False [ integer ]
parameters.parameter11: Debug Mode [ true | false (default) | verbose ] Adds additional logging
